With the forecast of freezing rain this morning during the commute to school and work, Oak Park Schools will be closed Tuesday, February 12, 2019. We will resume all operations on Wednesday, February 13, 2019. Please plan accordingly.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, but the safety of all of our students and staff were taken into consideration when making the decision to close this morning.

In the interim, students have access to educational websites where they can continue to build and reinforce their mathematics and reading skills. Students should also take time to read an age-appropriate, grade level book at a minimum of one hour today. Students can also write about their day without formal classroom instruction. Learning can take place at home by engaging in meaningful skill building practices. These are just a few ways that students can engage in learning, while away from the classroom due to the inclement weather.

Please stay safe and warm today.

Looking forward to your safe return on Wednesday, February 13, 2019.
